Help_git_base_url: Help: git_base_url - Remote git base space, e.g. https://github.com/deephdc, https://git.scc.kit.edu/deep,.. Enter to continue...
description: A short description of the project.
Help_app_version: Help: app_version - Application version (expects X.Y.Z (Major.Minor.Patch)). Enter to continue...
dockerhub_user: User account at hub.docker.com, e.g. 'deephdc' in https://hub.docker.com/u/deephdc
Help_docker_baseimage: Help: docker_baseimage - Base Docker image for Dockerfile, e.g. tensorflow/tensorflow . Enter to continue...
Help_baseimage_cpu_tag: Help: baseimage_cpu_tag - CPU tag for the baseimage, e.g. 1.10.0-py3. Has to match python version! Enter to continue...
Help_baseimage_gpu_tag: Help: baseimage_gpu_tag - GPU tag for the baseimage, e.g. 1.10.0-gpu-py3. Has to match python version! Enter to continue...
